description: From Latin adjective rītuālis, from noun rītuum (“rite”), + adjective suffix -ālis.

adjectives.description: ritual (comparative more ritual, superlative most ritual)

entries.meaning: Related to a rite or repeated set of actions.
examples: They performed the ritual lighting of the candles.

entries.meaning: A rite; a repeated set of actions.
examples: The priests carried out the religious ritual carefully.
